column2: "That situation on Naberius got out of hand. Nice to see you made it back alive."
"I heard a rumor, but it seems that ARKS is going to have a championship."
"It seems there's going to be some kind of trial, but I wonder what happens to ARKS who don't attend?"
"Who cares, it's not like it has anything to do with me."
"I wonder when they're going to hold the event. It's not set yet? Talk about poor planning."
"And what about the actual contents of the championship?"
"That hasn't been decided either? They're really slacking this year."
"Except it's not like I care at all. See you."
